---
Name: Feather Fall
Type: Spell
Tier: 1
DC: "11"
Description: |
    You may make an attempt to cast this spell when you fall.

    Your rate of descent slows so that you land safely on your feet.Duration: "Instant"
Range: "Self"
Classes: ['wizard']
Source: "Core"
---

### Feather Fall

_Tier 1, wizard_

**Duration:** Instant

**Range:** Self

You may make an attempt to cast this spell when you fall.

Your rate of descent slows so that you land safely on your feet.
